data.eml:eml: A new species of the South American genus Arthurella Albuquerque (Diptera: Muscidae), with a key to species and new records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Patitucci, Luciano Damián, Mariluis, Juan Carlos, Aballay, Fernando Hernán (2011): A new species of the South American genus Arthurella Albuquerque (Diptera: Muscidae), with a key to species and new records. Zootaxa 2810: 56-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206099
